backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing shipments with functions to add shipments, append events, and return snapshot views.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding, contact detail, and copy update requirements with associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variants for global theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup defining core routes and wrapping the app in a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/ContactDetailsCa: UI card component showing updated email, phone numbers, and office/registered addresses with business hours.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive header navigation with Di Logisolutions logo, desktop/mobile menus, and Get Quote button.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Standalone component displaying a minimal offline/maintenance message with no navigation.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCategoryS: Displays a titled service category with an icon and a grid of service cards.
frontend/src/components/ServicePreviewGr: Renders a four-item preview grid of predefined logistics service cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Provides the website footer with company info, quick links, services list, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with a header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StatsStrip.tsx: Shows a four-item statistics strip with icons and key logistics metrics.
frontend/src/entry.tsx: Application entry point that conditionally loads maintenance mode or the full app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used for the static site.
frontend/src/hooks/useShipmentTracking.t: Fetches shipment details from the backend using a tracking number and actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/contactValidation.ts: Validates contact form fields and returns errors for invalid input.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into human-readable date strings.
frontend/src/lib/maintenanceMode.ts: Contains a flag controlling whether the site runs in maintenance-only mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the main app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero text, stats, mission and values cards, and a 'Why Choose Us' section using mapped data arrays.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission simulation, and a contact details section alongside a hero header.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a background video hero, highlight metrics, CTAs, and a services preview grid.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows categorized logistics services, each with icons and descriptions, using a reusable category section component.
frontend/src/pages/TrackingPage.tsx: Provides a shipment tracking page with a disabled search form and a 'coming soon' notice.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and additional plugins.
